And what do you see in BannedLand?

4chan and Reddit for all your KSP needs after banning <G>

Well, it depends on where you're banned from:

  • Forums: You can still load the forums, but you'll receive a message that your account or IP has been banned instead of being shown the forum index. If your account was banned you can log out and continue to read the forums, but we do check for banned people that make new accounts, which can cause your IP to be blocked.
  • IRC channel: You can't join the channel, simple as that
  • Twitch: You can't chat with your account anymore, but still view the streams
  • Wiki: Either you can no longer edit pages or the only thing you'll see is an error message telling you to get out

Well, I was banned for a month for racism (DISCLAIMER: I'm not racist, I just really like racist jokes, asking me to stop them is like asking me to stop breathing). Here's how it went:

I couldn't even browse the forums while logged in. It only showed that I was banned and when the ban would end. Therefore I had to log out to browse the forums. Obviously I couldn't post like that, which wasn't such a big problem until I saw someone asking for a mod that would add a note pad in the game. No one else seemed to know the mod that I was using (and still use) so I decided that the ban be damned and created another account just to help that guy. Then I begged some moderator (I don't remember who, I think it was the one with a big smiley as an avatar) to approve that post (when you post for the first time, a moderator has to approve that post for it to appear) or at least suggest that mod himself. Unfortunately that didn't happen. Fortunately my ban wasn't extended and someone else suggested that mod anyway. Then it went on like it had been for quite some time, I couldn't post, but could read the forums. Sometimes it was slightly annoying, most of the time it just kept me away from pointless arguments, I guess. Then it ended, I could post again and catch up on my inbox. One thing that did happen was that after the ban was lifted, I didn't get back into the forum games. I used to be pretty active in these, now I occasionally check them, if I'm really bored.

So I guess it's not as scary as it seems, but it's bad when you really want to help someone that other people can't help.
